summary: Adds missing perks from Syynxs Perky
descriptionHtml:
So basically I was playing with Syynxs Perky http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12862/? and I noticed that some of the perks were missing or inaccessible. So I created a small batch file that adds the perks to your character. Primarily for those that are unfamiliar with using the command console.

So far I have only added a few perks that I have noticed. If I notice more, or someone comments one that I have missed I will add them to the bat file.

Smithing:
Glass Smithing
Dwarven Smithing
Orcish Smithing
Ebony Smithing
Daedric Smithing
Dragon Smithing

1-H:
Fists of Steel

Use:
1. Download the .rar file
2. Extract the .txt and place the .txt file in your Skyrim directory
3. Launch game and load your save file
4. Press the tilde button "~" ( on US keyboards it is located to the left of the "1" key)
    this will open the command console and pause the game
5. Type in "bat perks" without the quotations
6. (Optional) go to a forge and verify that you have all the craft-able items in the proper categories.

If there are any questions feel free to comment and I or another user will assist as best as possible.
And if you like it feel free to endorse. :)
author: KageSama19
